bibl.title: Constructing Legitimacy: The Ptolemaic Familiengruppe as a Means of Self-Definition in Posidippus' Hippika.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: KOSMETATOU, Elizabeth

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309, coll. xi, 20-xiv, 1 = 71-88 Austin-Bastianini.
KOSMETATOU Elizabeth, Constructing Legitimacy: The Ptolemaic Familiengruppe as a Means of Self-Definition in Posidippus' Hippika.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 225-246 et pl. 1 (p. 345).
